page.title: 13HOPE BARTON FARM,MALBOROUGH
page.content: Hope Barton Farm is on the outskirts of Inner Hope about one mile from Bolbery Copse. {Hope Barton}belongs to{Mr}and{Mrs {Ling.}One of the fields at Hope Barton belongs to {The National Trust.}Mr and Mrs Ling who own Hope Barton have converted four barns and are now converting a fifth barn for the disabled.The farm animals consist of cows and sheep. The house itself was built in 1865 and was first owned by {The Earl of Devon. Twenty five years ago the house caught fire and it did a lot of damage.Mr. Ling used to own 450 arces.The barns which are now converted into flats used to have loose boxes,calf pens and a chicken house,or sometimes hay and straw in them.
